Sentencas: A methane catalytic decomposition reactor-direct carbon fuel cell-internal reforming solid oxide fuel cell (MCDR-DCFC-IRSOFC) energy system is highly efficient for converting the chemical energy of methane into electrical energy.
Titulo: High efficiency chemical energy conversion system based on a methane catalytic decomposition reaction and two fuel cells. Part II. Exergy analysis

Sentencas: A gas turbine cycle is also used to output more power from the thermal energy generated in the IRSOFC.
Titulo: High efficiency chemical energy conversion system based on a methane catalytic decomposition reaction and two fuel cells. Part II. Exergy analysis

Sentencas: In part I of this work, models of the fuel cells and the system are proposed and validated.
Titulo: High efficiency chemical energy conversion system based on a methane catalytic decomposition reaction and two fuel cells. Part II. Exergy analysis

Sentencas: In this part, exergy conservation analysis is carried out based on the developed electrochemical and thermodynamic models.
Titulo: High efficiency chemical energy conversion system based on a methane catalytic decomposition reaction and two fuel cells. Part II. Exergy analysis

Sentencas: The ratio of the exergy destruction of each unit is examined.
Titulo: High efficiency chemical energy conversion system based on a methane catalytic decomposition reaction and two fuel cells. Part II. Exergy analysis

Sentencas: The results show that the electrical exergy efficiency of 68.24% is achieved with the system.
Titulo: High efficiency chemical energy conversion system based on a methane catalytic decomposition reaction and two fuel cells. Part II. Exergy analysis

Sentencas: The possibility of further recovery of the waste heat is discussed and the combined power-heat exergy efficiency is over 80%.
Titulo: High efficiency chemical energy conversion system based on a methane catalytic decomposition reaction and two fuel cells. Part II. Exergy analysis
